Requires Python 2.5

Dependencies : pyftpdlib

Install pyftpdlib using easy_install

andycat$ sudo easy_install pyftpdlib
Password:
Searching for pyftpdlib
Reading http://pypi.python.org/simple/pyftpdlib/
Reading http://code.google.com/p/pyftpdlib/
Best match: pyftpdlib 0.5.1
Downloading http://pyftpdlib.googlecode.com/files/pyftpdlib-0.5.1.tar.gz
Processing pyftpdlib-0.5.1.tar.gz
Running pyftpdlib-0.5.1/setup.py -q bdist_egg --dist-dir /tmp/easy_install-RYjq2Z/pyftpdlib-0.5.1/egg-dist-tmp-qbX9VJ
zip_safe flag not set; analyzing archive contents...
Adding pyftpdlib 0.5.1 to easy-install.pth file

Installed /Library/Python/2.5/site-packages/pyftpdlib-0.5.1-py2.5.egg
Processing dependencies for pyftpdlib
Finished processing dependencies for pyftpdlib
